attributes.review: Do I need to explain? It needs to be off the app store for good. The app was just horribly designed and the colors made my eyes hurt. Also, the pictures of clown made my eyes bleed. Plus, you’re already rich, why are you asking the people you tax to donate to you? So selfish. Everything about this app is just plain wrong. Take it down. I would give it 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrid.

attributes.review:
I got this app to keep up to date with our wonderful and amazing president, but I am greatly disappointed in our president. When trying to log onto the app it takes centuries for the screen to appear. Not only that, the app asks for to much information, to the point where it’s breaking boundaries. Honestly don’t get this app. 
rather your should ✨Stream blackpink ✨
attributes.title: Laggy

attributes.review: This is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded as soon as i opened it, it completely took over my phone. every time i clicked any other app it would take me straight to this one this app gave my device 37 different viruses and it even went as far to give ME the STOMACH VIRUS!!!!! I feared for my life because of this terrible app and I am absolutely disgusted don’t ever get it!!!
attributes.title: Dangerous and exceedingly horrible!!!

attributes.review: I was more than happy to support my president as much as I can. But I have to admit I have not been more fearful of my life . I’ve been hearing what seems like Donald j trumps voice everywhere. When I would go to where I hear it coming from, a single Cheeto would be on the floor. And when I wake up there’s always a chunky oompa loompa man shaped marking on my sheets. Do not, I REPEAT! .. do not get this app! You were warned.
attributes.title: Disturbing

attributes.review:
I AM FURIOUS!!! I am a mother of four and of course a woman of god and lover of our lord and savior Donald J. Trump, or at least I was! As soon as I opened the application on my device Donald contacted me personally to tell me I should vaccinate my kids and that I would be excommunicated from the church!!!! ON TOP OF THIS HE TOLD ME THAT I WAS MUCH TO BIG TO FIT INTO ANY OF HIS MERCHANDISE!!! UNBELIEVABLE! Needless to say I will be returning all of the Trump memorabilia and deleting the app! I encourage all to do the same! 

Ps. BLACK LIVE MATTER
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APPLICATION!!😠😤

attributes.review: My phone had a seizure after I downloaded it. I put a bandaid on it so it stopped but then out of nowhere my dog threw up after having a picture of Trump-kun pop up. After comforting my dog I realized that I left my cookies in the oven for too long. They’re basically charcoal now, so I had to deal with this app AND burnt cookies. In conclusion this app made my cookies taste like the presiden– I mean clownery 👻👻👻🐷🤠👌😈😁🤪😯🤡
attributes.title: So Basically It‘s Doodoo 💩😚💅

attributes.review: Hate this app! Not worth downloading, waste of storage and space just like Trump himself. 😍😍✨. Baddie 🥵😝😍✨ but without the “Bad” 🧚‍♀️💋🥰😘. Everyone is a gift from god🦋🥰💓 Hope ur parents kept the receipt 🧚🏼‍♀️💘✨🧚‍♀️. Smile forever 💕🧚‍♂️✨ Yellow is my favorite color ✨💕🧚‍♂️, p.s. I love your wig it looks absolutely terrible on you 🥵😜. Also maybe one day you can teach me your skincare routine, I would love to have rotten orange skin like yours 😝😍😘💋💖😜💝.
attributes.title: Absolutely Disgusting

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, while at work. It kept going off nonstop telling me to vote for Trump. I’m not even eligible to vote 🙈. Anywhoooo, I kept getting random calls to go donate, but I haven’t even received my paycheck. My boss got mad at me because it kept going off, so now I lost my job. 😔. Hopefully this app gets the fix it needs, because it needs it, along with the fixing of our government, so go vote 🧚‍♀️🥰! Xoxo
attributes.title: SPAMM

attributes.review: As much as I love Trump, it’s hard to ignore the amount of fake news on this app. I’m super excited for him to be re-elected, but he should make his app as trustworthy as he is. The liberals will tell you he isn’t trustworthy, but they’re WORNG! You can go look up his tax returns right now because and trustworthy president would release their tax returns. Anyways Trump 2020! I’m an immigrant for the border wall and I approve this message!
attributes.title: This app is trash

attributes.review: I’m pretty familiar with all sorts of different apps but this is probably the worst one I have ever used. I know nothing about designing apps but I bet I could make a better app than whoever made this garbage. I spent 6 years of school using a Lenovo think pad which is by far the slowest computer I have ever used and yet Lenovo has better programming than this app.
attributes.title: The app is the equivalent to a Lenovo thinkpad
